extendedInfo.description: Thrilling action, dauntless heroes, and stunning graphics, all wrapped up in a compelling multi-scenario storyline! The journey starts now in Demonic Savior!Play in English, Korean, or Japanese!Thrilling Action and Stunning Graphics!- Utilize each character's unique fighting style to defeat your enemies! - Lose yourself in the vivid graphics of this Hit & Run game!A Compelling Multi-Scenario Storyline!- Follow the captivating story as it unfolds from the perspective of 4 main characters!Over 300 grand quests!- Up to 60 main and sub-quests for every character, and over 300 quests for you to conquer!* Items can be purchased in this game. To avoid extra service fees, some items may be purchased through a subscription service. * For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit www.com2us.com.* For questions or customer support, e-mail info@com2us.com.ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great game. Good gfx. Nice storyline. Overall GREAT!!  Keep up the good work. ^_^
reviews.author: maki morales

reviews.title: Thumbs up
reviews.comment: Nice game and easy to play I recommend it to everyone they wont regret it.,  especially those who love rpg games.
reviews.author: Arthur San Pascual

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice game withawesome graphics and sound. With that, 5 star for you guys!
reviews.author: Marc Manio

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Very addictive game. I can\'t seem to put it down. I played Inotia and it\'s great to see that the same intensity is put in other games. Great game guys. :)
reviews.author: Tony Tiger

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: An awezome game to play . A great story!
reviews.author: Christopher Rogers

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Love the graphics, great storyline, fun characters, cool abilities
reviews.author: Cindy Webber

reviews.title: Surprisingly addicting
reviews.comment: This game is quite fun.  It quickly hooked me in and before I knew it I was playing for a good deal of time.  It certainly has my seal of approval.
reviews.author: Nathan Pollard

reviews.title: 3ple exellent
reviews.comment: Very nice game. And i love it. Nice apic story. Theres a lot of new games but this one is the most coolest i ever played. Keep up the good work.  More power
reviews.author: Reign Qing

reviews.title: Good rpg
reviews.comment: Good rpg game but, if you people can make this game load without using the internet, ill give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Clark Fernandez

reviews.title: Best RPG game on the Android market!
reviews.comment: Great game! Started of a lil glitchy, WAY better now! can\'t wait see what happens next!
reviews.author: Jonathan Fausto

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for an great rpg adventure game for awhile, finally found one with this. The story so far is good, the skill point settings could be a little confusing at first, but you get use to it pretty fast. Each character has it\'s own story, which is a plus. The only thing that I would complain about is the speed of the game, whenever I click.on something it takes awhile ( 2 secs ) to swich to the screen/menu, basically it isn\'t that smooth when.clicking on the inventory screen or menu screen.
reviews.author: Kordell Kennedy

reviews.title: HCool
reviews.comment: You should try this game. Its really fun. Having busy days. Keep up the good work com2us.
reviews.author: randolf pontillano

reviews.title: BEST ROLE PLAYING GAME EVER
reviews.comment: Nice..
reviews.author: Yhowee Galvan

reviews.title: Pretty Cool Stuff
reviews.comment: Demonic Savior is a beautiful game. Each move has a signature look and everything moves fluidly. There is quite a bit of lag time when accessing the pause menu or store, but otherwise, a solid game.
reviews.author: Robert Cox

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Super fun to play.
reviews.author: Mico Dioquino

reviews.title: Nice gameplay!
reviews.comment: Gameplay is fun and addictive
reviews.author: Neptahli Parian

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: This is the best game ever played on a phone.
reviews.author: Anthony Faulk

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Fun RPG with great quests and level up opportunities
reviews.author: Roderick Williams

reviews.title: Watt?
reviews.comment: Downloaded, installed, done........ But it stuck at the loading state then forces close. Hella, I\'d rather play angry birds than this. Otherwise though, fix this problem
reviews.author: syafrizal taufiqurrahman

reviews.title: Need some input
reviews.comment: This is a great game...but here a thing, in this game its hard to heal ur hp n mp...the only way to heal it to use potion and the price of the pot no to mention insanely high but the pot effect is also low that can heal only around 180 - 250 hp..what the hell with that? I have hp around 2k and the price of the pot that only heal 180-250 cost 3000 gold? Not to mention its hard to get gild in this game...here an idea, give the char have the ability to heal it self when he/she not attacking mob? Fix this!!!
reviews.author: nadzrin isza
